https://tmrev.io/movie/459350-Aircraft Carrier - Guardian of the Seas 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/glgouhVUkrufzUInU7TdZXMase4.jpg The mission to protect and defend the world's oceans has become far more complex and challenging in recent years, and naval aviation has become increasingly vital to success. One of the greatest engineering feats in history, the modern U.S. nuclear carrier is a masterpiece of technology, and the flagship of the fleet. With RIMPAC, the world’s largest and most comprehensive international maritime training exercise providing a stunning visual context for the story, find yourself aboard the carrier alongside the 5,000 highly skilled sea and air personnel conducting flight operations in the midst of the simulated war exercises taking place there. Rarely has there been a topic so visually suited and compelling for IMAX® and other giant screen theaters. Aircraft Carrier - Guardian of the Seas
